about.title: About me
about.subtitle: About
about.text1: I am a 27-year-old frontend developer with experience in developing web applications with JavaScript & Angular. So far I have worked as business intelligence consultant acquiring skills in SQL, MDX and database administration. However, i realized at a certain point, that my passion lies with in web development - here is my story:
about.text2: During my side job in a soap manufacory I discovered my passion for web development and web design while working on the new webshop. I was supported by my family and friends to make my passion my profession. Therefore I started working on private projects but I soon realized that I would not be able to do it without professional support besides my full time job as consultant.
about.text3: So I decided to become a frontend developer and take professional training to reach my goal. Here I have worked both on my own and in a team on various projects. This intensive training allowed me to quickly gain experience and deepen my knowledge.
about.text4: I made it and I am looking forward to continuing my developer career with a job in a webdeveloper position. If you think I'd be a good match for your projects, please do not hesitate to contact me!

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: This page shows some samples of my work - please feel free to try them out.
portfolio.rofText: A small game-app inspired by the popular drinking card game. Share the game with your friends and have fun!
portfolio.eplText: A Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
portfolio.joinText: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
portfolio.pokedexText: Based on the PokéAPI library that provides and catalogues pokémon information.
portfolio.donutText: This delivery service website was inspired by Lieferando. Main focus of this project is the simulation of a easy online shopping process.

contact.contactHeader: Want to discuss a new project?
contact.subheader: Say hello and let's realize your ideas together!
